body.name: ELIVED UL Listed TV Wall Mount for Most 37-82 Inch Flat Screen TVs, Swivel and Tilt Full Motion TV Mount Bracket, Max VESA 600x400mm, 100 lbs. Loading, Fits 16" Wood Studs, YD3003
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 9 mins
features: Universal TV Wall Mount - This wall mount fits most 37,42,46,50,55,60,65,70,75,80,82 inch TVs with VESA from 150x100mm to 600x400mm up to 100 lbs./45kg, fitting 16" wood studs spacing. Please check TV weight, VESA, wood studs spacing and input access before purchase. Search B08XYSBPC5 for YD3005 if you have 24" wood studs.

Optimal Viewing Angle - Wall TV mount can swivel ±45° to cover more viewing positions, tilt +5/-13° to reduce screen glare and neck pain, level the screen ±3° after installation. Come with wrench to easily adjust the tilt and level screws. Note: The wrench provided is NOT for lag bolts of wall installation.

Solid as A Tank - ELIVED TV wall mount designed with 6 articulating arms extend up to 15.7" and retracts back to 2.46" for maximum flexibility. Heavy duty TV wall bracket made of cold-formed steel ensures strength and is reliable for the TV and your families.

Quick & Easy to Install - Our wall mount TV bracket comes with step-by-step manual, bubble level and necessary hardware to help complete the installation. Concrete anchors will be sent per request. DO NOT install into drywall alone!
Friendly Service - Our professional support team is available to answer your pre-purchase and installation questions. Please let us know if you have any concerns or need assistance anytime!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Maximize your viewing experience Wall Mount TV Bracket YD3003 Fits 12" and 16" wood studsHolds TV safe and steadyGreat product to ehance home happiness Friendly Support - Let us know for any concerns and suggestions!

Does the socket wrench included work for the lag bolts of wall installation? The socket wrench came with the TV mount is only used to adjust the tilting and leveling screws. It is NOT for the lag botls. How to make sure I purchase the correct wall mount that fits my TV? Please confirm the TV specs and wood studs before purchase. This wall mount YD3003 fits Max 82" TVs up to 100 lbs with VESA 150x100mm to 600x400mm, fitting Max 16" wood studs spacing. Let us know if you're not sure about the TV info. What should I do if the TV wall mount doesn't reach both wood studs? 1. Use (2pcs top and bottom) 2x4" wood boards to bridge across the wood studs then install the wall mount. 2. We suggest another model YD3005 for 24" stud spacing(search B08XYSBPC5). 3. Kindly let us know and we'll offer further solutions for you! The articulating arm feels stiff/hard to move. The full motion wall mount is normally slightly stiff thus the TV weight won't move the TV from position easily. Please add some additional oil/grease or a little WD40 on the arm joints which will slowly smoothen the movement overtime as being used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Viewing Experience with the ELIVED UL Listed TV Wall Mount!
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking to take your TV-watching experience to new heights, look no further than the ELIVED UL Listed TV Wall Mount. As a proud owner of a 65-inch flat screen TV, I can confidently say that this wall mount has exceeded all my expectations and transformed my entertainment setup for the better.First and foremost, the installation process was a breeze. The kit came with all the necessary hardware and easy-to-follow instructions, making it a stress-free endeavor even for someone with limited DIY skills like myself. Within minutes, my TV was securely mounted to the wall, and the level of sturdiness and reliability it provided was truly impressive. I felt confident that my valuable TV was safe and snug, giving me peace of mind even in earthquake-prone regions. The robust UL listing gave me an added sense of assurance, knowing that it met the highest safety standards in the industry.Not only is the ELIVED TV wall mount sturdy, but it also offers exceptional versatility. Designed to fit most 37-82 inch flat screen TVs, it caters to a wide range of sizes, making it a future-proof investment even if I decide to upgrade my TV in the future. The full motion articulating arms allow for an extensive range of viewing angles, ensuring that everyone in the room can enjoy the best seat in the house. Tilt, swivel, and rotation adjustments are a breeze, giving me the freedom to optimize the viewing experience based on the content being displayed.Overall, the ELIVED UL Listed TV Wall Mount has been an outstanding addition to my home entertainment setup. Its robust build, straightforward installation, and unparalleled flexibility have truly elevated my TV-watching experience. Whether you have a 37-inch TV or an 82-inch behemoth, this wall mount is an excellent choice that brings both functionality and safety to the forefront. I can wholeheartedly recommend the ELIVED TV wall mount to anyone seeking to maximize their TV's potential and take their viewing pleasure to new heights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy mount for TV
reviews.reviewText: For the money, this is an excellent product. Easy to install, and has a nice, sturdy feel to it. I do wish that it had a slightly wider wall plate to accommodate instances where the stud spacing is not ideal for where you want to mount the TV. You are left with a couple of inches of "play" on the TV side mounting plate if you install directly between 2 16 on center studs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs!
reviews.reviewText: Needed to hang a television in my daughter's room and the bracket I had from a different TV covered the inputs for the cords to be plugged into, so I chose this one. She usually keeps it mounted flush to the wall, but it extends nicely and tilts with some added use of a wrench (included). Takes some fine-tuning if you want to have easy motion on it, but it's sturdy as can be and easy to install.NOTE: Would recommend two people for doing the actual hanging, but it comes with a template for marking holes with a nifty easel-type fold out that holds an included bubble measure to make sure you get it perfectly level. Pretty impressed with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice but not happy with horizontal bracing
reviews.reviewText: This is a good TV Mount easy to install. The weak link that I didnt like was the horizontal braces that do not come as part of the initial bracket. They are strong enough to hold my 55" and will probably last the life of the bracket Just was not as sturdy as I would like and had a bit of a sag in the mounting. Nothing to affect the performance just a design flaw that I think I would have beefed up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Installation:The included tools are laughably inadequate, a decent socket set, power driver, Wd-40, and a proper levelhelped, but the thing is very well designed, a template for hanging the bolt on the wall would have been nice, but it did install reasonable ease, the hardest part was finding the studs really.Operation:Super Sturdy; Confidence is good that it will hold forever, hanging the 70inch TV took two and a halfmen and some fiddling with the tighten down screws, but it is very satisfactory and surprisingly levelArticulates well if the nuts are not over tightened (as delivered) the tilt did require additional torque to keep from slipping.hints: lubricate to bolts and slightly loosen them to move the big boy around once it is hung and have two phillips screw drivers ready to snug the bottom screws once it is hung. when you get it where youwant it, then tighten down the nuts on the articulating bolts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This item went up on the wall very easily. The template is spot on once you identify the studs in your wall. Would buy again for sure. Holds up a 65 in tv with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was exactly what we needed and works good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Xlnt mount very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This mount is well made and holds our Hisense 76" tv great. The only thing is the wall bracket is just wide enough for 16" spaced studs so you have to be pretty on point when you drill as there is no extra side to side space if you don't get the bracket perfectly centered on the 16" wall studs. Wish they would have made the bracket at least an inch or two wider so you have some wiggle room. Not a big deal though.
Me llego pero no lo rebicer y paso un tiempo y cuando lo iva a usar esta imcompleto

reviews.reviewTitle: The Best Thing For TVs Since Netflix.
reviews.reviewText: Do not let the reviews fool you. It was the most difficult mounts to install. The instructions were bad and might have been for a different mount. It took all day with three people.It does seem like extremely excellent quality and really is the best thing for TVs since they turned smart.Do yourself a favour and hire someone to install it with the money you save on Amazon.
Good tv mount for price, as described
Kinda sketched out about the part the TV mounts on as it's just individual bars held in by tiny screws...but we shall see!
